## PlayerUIEventPayloads."PLAYER\_UI.LOCK\_POINTER" property

Emitted when the player's mouse pointer is locked or unlocked.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerUIEvent.LOCK_POINTER]: {
        playerUI: PlayerUI;
        lock: boolean;
    };
```
